Evanescent (The Countenance #2) by Addison Moore (April 10th 2013)

Sixteen-year-old Laken Stewart died last summer. Her resurrection at the hands of the Countenance hasnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t run smoothly. With the memory of her past life still firmly intact, Laken moves deeper into the Countenance organization in an effort to free her mother and sister from the deadly Celestra tunnels. 

The love she feels for her boyfriend, Wesley, is compromised when gorgeous Cooper Flanders teams up with her in the fight to free their families. Old bonds are slowly severed as new ones are galvanized.
